Package client

Class ClientBackEnd

java.lang.Object
ocsf.client.AbstractClient
client.ClientBackEnd
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientBackEnd extends ocsf.client.AbstractClient
ClientBackEnd class serves as back end manager for client side in the program. It handles communication with the server. It extends OCSF AbstractClient.
